page.title: 01A DAY IN THE LIFE OF RICHARD
page.content: At 07.30 I wake up and get dressed in to my school uniform.I wear black trousers,a grey jumper,a teeshirt, pants and socks. I go downstairs and have my breakfast_usually Sugar Puffs. My dad leaves for work in a taxi. After he has gone I put my trainers on and walk to school at 08.30. At school I go out to play for 10 minutes and then I come in and do Maths, Language and Reading until 10.30.Then we go out to play until 10.50.When I come in I do a variety of work.At 12.00 we have lunch.There is usually salad and some sort of potato and hot meal.At 13.15 we do more work until 15.15 when it is home time.After school I go out to play until 16.00.I watch television until 18.30, have tea,then watch television again until 20.30, when I go upstairs, clean my teeth, and go to bed.
